name: The Unforgettable Dordogne Chateau
description:
DESCRIPTION
A luxurious, fairytale hilltop chateau overlooking one of France’s most beautiful regions – the Dordogne’s Perigord Noir. Completely modernised, the chateau retains all its original classic features whilst providing luxurious living with extraordinary period charm.
Surrounded by a 100 acre forest providing stunning views from the high cliff edges and allowing for strolls up through the forest to the dilapidated walls of ancient Roman church ruin.
Rent this luxury venue for a weekend or even an entire week and the staff will be on hand to look after your every wish from catering and planning, parties and excursions and much more.
With a clifftop luxury pool, relaxing courtyards, historic ramparts, Al Fresco outdoor dining overlooking the Dordogne river, multi terraced gardens and a state-of-the-art private luxurious spa with a steam room, a zen waterfall, a yoga studio and a fully equipped gym - you and your guests will enjoy an unforgettable experience in the most beautiful surroundings.
YOUR WEDDING
Whatever your vision is for your memorable event, you will endure a jaw dropping experience that will be remembered forever.
A large variety of event spaces from the courtyards to the ramparts the gardens to the forest, provides an amazing opportunity to have an absolutely unique experience. And of course, there is the Chateau itself. Remodeled to a 5 star standard with each room absolutely uniquely appointed. And of course the Royal Suite for the groom and bride.
There are many unique romantic opportunities for your event. Taking your vows in one of many different places, depending on your preference. Dining al fresco overlooking the Dordogne Valley. Having an enchanted forest event – wine tasting or band or dining. Listening to a string quartet in the biblioteque. Performing a vigil in the dilapidated ancient Roman church on the top of the hill. Dancing in the ancient courtyard by the side of an ancient stone 15m waterfall. Taking a hike to the ancient caves overlooking the Dordogne valley. Performing a hillside firework display over the entire Dordogne valley …
Whatever your dream may be, we have many options. If you need a wedding planner, we offer that too.
Originally built as an 11th century mansion overlooking the Dordogne valley, the current building was restored in the nineteenth century in an inspired revival resulting in this fairy tale chateau.
The chateau has an extraordinary history in its millennia. It played a role in the 14th century During the Hundred Years War by harbouring soldiers and providing a strategic location for observation.
The Chateau is ideally located for your exploration of this extraordinary region which contains over a thousand chateaux, many Michelin restaurants, famous markets, Knight Templar citadels and not to mention the overwhelming number of activities in the region – canoeing, cycling, rock climbing, hot air ballooning and many, many more.
ACCOMMODATION
The Chateau offers many luxurious and classic living spaces as well as nine highly appointed bedroom suites, sleeping 18 guests, all overlooking the Dordogne valley. Each bedroom suite has a theme and every detail has been carefully matched. The first floor of the chateau has bedroom suites from the renaissance era and the second floor has bedroom suites of the medieval era, representing the different eras of the chateaus existence:
A Royal suite featuring its own turret, a luxurious bathroom, a sitting area with magnificent views and a separate bedroom featured with a tall stone cathedral vaulted ceiling and stain glass windows
A grande salon with extraordinary painted ceilings and a massive fireplace
A large classic French gourmet chef kitchen
A period biblioteque with an original tapestry, oil paintings and many interesting artefacts
A period dining room with original classic features, painted walls, original chandeliers – all fit for the kings
A large enclosed courtyard and two outside lounge areas for evening relaxing
An outside dining area overlooking the Dordogne valley
Exclusively yours for your wedding day.
Prices start from 16,500 euros for exclusive hire for four nights which includes luxury accommodation for 18 guests. Please do get in touch for more information and we will be more than happy to help.
